title: Night Train for Inverness (1960 - UK) drama
description:
Night Train for Inverness (1960 - UK)

Drama
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0054121/


When ex-convict Roy Lewis turns up in London to see his estranged wife and 7 year old son Ted, his mother-in-law refuses to let him see them. Frustrated, he kidnaps his son and boards the night train to Inverness for a new life in Scotland. But Ted is a diabetic and Roy hasn't got any insulin. Meanwhile, a police manhunt is launched. Gutsy (for its time) and very watchable, Night Train to Inverness is certainly a period curio, not least because that is indeed Dennis "Minder" Waterman as young Ted.


Video: XviD, 720x544, 25.000 fps, 1959 Kbps, 01h07m33s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 256 kbps

VHS quality, English audio, no subtitles
